channel.title: Projects on Sergey Daniloff (@Pencroff) site
channel.description: Recent content in Projects on Sergey Daniloff (@Pencroff) site

item.title: Algorithms and Data Structures in Typescript
item.description: Variations of generic examples of different algorithms / data structures in Typescript. Almost 100% unit tests code coverage. Please check: Github repo Docs

item.title: typeorm-better-sqlite3 driver
item.description: Fast better-sqlite3 driver for Typeorm. Very useful for prototyping and experiments on local machine. It’s 10x or even 18x faster for some cases - link Github repo Docs example

item.title: PerfJS
item.description: Compare performance different JavaScript approaches in your browser. Developed with Angular 4 (with example of localizations English / Ukrainian). Since that time I participated in number of migrations from AngularJs to Angular 2+ and from CanJs to React (hook based app) DEMO Github repo Non framework experiment

item.title: MEAN Buildup
item.description: I mentored Angular BuildUp in Dublin. Attendees did some training with AngularJs. I did an implementation of back-end for MEAN stack. More details about implementation you could find in my repo. Implementation base on Express with token authorization for private API and no authorization for public API. I developed api which recognizes name of the model as an url parameter and then picks available repository from Unit of work. This was done for simplicity of declaration any CRUD actions for any new model.

item.title: Kea config
item.description: Configuration manager for Node.js applications with perfect performance and without dependencies. Main feature of this configuration manager is merging configuration files depending on Node.js environment, it supports references to other keys and using templates with objects for complex string values. GitHub Lightning talk Presentation

item.title: Moa.js
item.description: Library for declaration object inheritance, mixins, static methods / properties / mixins, etc. in ES5 GitHub Docs Class implementation Benchmark

item.title: Dapper-DAL
item.description: Data access layer with Dapper as wrapper IDbConnection GitHub. Light and quick implementation of data Repository pattern
